name: Charm AI
description: Charm AI is a platform that unifies advanced image vitalisation tools through blockchain technology. Addressing a critical gap in the AI market, it offers creators a seamless and accessible way to integrate multiple APIs—including image-to-video, text-to-speech, and lip syncing—into their workflows. The platform, supported by the $CHRM token, democratises content creation by eliminating financial barriers and streamlining processes into a user-friendly experience. Leveraging Solana's high-speed blockchain, Charm AI ensures sustainable operations, transparent tokenomics, and ongoing innovation. Our roadmap outlines a commitment to continuous improvement, integrating user feedback and emerging technologies to redefine the boundaries of creative possibilities.
